Meta.title: Hadaf Market
Meta.description: The largest online marketplace in Uzbekistan

Hero.slider_desc: Festive discounts on all home appliances.

Checkout.pickup_info: Currently, pickup is only available from the Yunusobod district branch in Tashkent.
Checkout.terms: By clicking the button you agree to the public offer terms

Product.no_reviews: No reviews yet. Be the first!

Wishlist.title: Wishlist
Wishlist.empty_desc: Click the heart icon on a product to add it to your wishlist

Footer.download_app_desc: HADAF - Uzbekistan's reliable online trading platform. Purchases with us are convenient and fast!

Auth.code_sent: We sent a code to the number

Favorites.empty_desc: Add items you like to favorites

Notifications.title: Notifications
Notifications.subtitle: Important messages and news

Profile.title: Profile
Profile.notif_desc: Receive notifications about news and promotions
Profile.name: Name
Profile.name_min: Name must be at least 2 characters
Profile.username_invalid: Username must be at least 3 characters
Profile.invite_friends_desc: Get 20,000 UZS bonus for each friend you invite.
Profile.security_subtitle: Manage your account protection and password.
Profile.2fa_desc: Add an extra layer of security to your account by requiring more than just a password to log in.
Profile.biometric_desc: Enable passwordless login using your phone's fingerprint or face recognition (FaceID).
Profile.biometric_setup_desc: Want to log in without a password next time? Enable biometric authentication now.

Support.title: How can we help?
Support.subtitle: Have questions? Our team is ready to help you.
Support.q3: How much is the delivery cost?
Support.q4: What is the product return policy?
Support.a1: To place an order, select a product, add it to the cart, and click the checkout button.
Support.a2: We accept payments via Click, Payme, and cash on delivery.
Support.a3: Delivery within Tashkent is free. For other regions, according to tariffs.
Support.a4: You can return the product within 24 hours if a defect is found.

OrderSuccess.title: Thank you for your order!
OrderSuccess.subtitle: Your order has been accepted and is being processed.

About.hero_desc: HADAF is not just a store. It is a modern platform that sets standards of convenience, speed, and honesty for the residents of Surkhandarya and all of Uzbekistan.
About.mission_title: Improving quality of life through technology
About.mission_desc: Our main goal is to deliver high-quality products to every doorstep in the Surkhandarya region. No need to waste time visiting markets. We simplify shopping through the latest technology and an innovative logistics system.

mission_points.p1: Increasing digital literacy of the population
mission_points.p2: Ensuring a wide assortment across all districts

features.logistic_desc: We deliver within Termez city in 24 hours, and to districts within 2-3 days.
features.guarantee_desc: Every product has an official warranty and undergoes strict quality control.
features.support_desc: We are ready to answer your questions 7 days a week.

About.values_desc: The foundation of our business is honesty and loyalty to our customers

values_cards.v1_desc: For us, every buyer is not just a customer, but a valued guest. We approach every request individually.
values_cards.v2_desc: We only sell original and certified products. No place for fakes.
values_cards.v3_desc: Constant development and pursuit of new things is our way of life.
values_cards.v4_desc: Our prices are fixed, payments are transparent. No hidden fees.

About.history_desc: From a small idea to becoming the largest marketplace in Surkhandarya.

history_steps.s1_desc: Studying the Surkhandarya market and developing the project concept.
history_steps.s2_desc: Website and Mobile app were fully developed and tested.
history_steps.s3_desc: Starting large-scale operations throughout the region.

About.cta_desc: Are you an entrepreneur? Sell your products on the HADAF platform.

Delivery.title: Fast Delivery
Delivery.subtitle: Reliable service throughout Surkhandarya
Delivery.termiz_desc: Express delivery service within the city.
Delivery.terms_p1: After order confirmation, our couriers will contact you to coordinate the delivery time.
Delivery.terms_p2: When delivering large household appliances, the service of bringing them into your apartment may be carried out by separate agreement.
Delivery.warning_desc: If external defects are found when the product is delivered, inform the courier immediately.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Answers to your questions

items.a1: Delivery within Termez city is 15,000 UZS. The cost for districts is determined based on the distance.
items.q2: How fast will the order arrive?
items.a2: Within 24 hours in Termez city. It is delivered to the districts of Surkhandarya in 2-3 days.
items.a3: You can pay in cash, via Payme, Click, or Uzcard/Humo plastic cards.
items.q4: Is there a warranty on the product?
items.a4: Yes, an official manufacturer's warranty is provided for all appliances and electronics.
items.a5: Currently, there is no installment sale service. We work only on a full payment basis.
items.a6: Our central store is located in Termez city. You can find the exact address on the 'Our Stores' page.
items.q7: How can I place an order?
items.a7: Select the desired product on our site, click 'Add to Cart' and fill out the order form.
items.q8: How to use a promo code?
items.a8: During the ordering process, you can enter the promo code in a special field to get a discount.

FAQ.cta_title: Didn't find the answer to your question?
FAQ.cta_desc: Contact our operators, they will be happy to help you.

Returns.title: Return Policy
Returns.subtitle: Order of return and exchange of goods
Returns.alert_desc: When receiving the product, check its integrity in the presence of the courier.
Returns.s1_desc: In accordance with the law of the Republic of Uzbekistan 'On protection of consumer rights', the buyer has the right to return or exchange a product of proper quality within 10 days.
Returns.s2_desc: The product is accepted for return if:
Returns.s2_p1: The product has not been used;
Returns.s2_p2: The product appearance and packaging are preserved;
Returns.s2_p3: There is a purchase receipt or document confirming payment.
Returns.s3_desc: The following items are not returnable (unless defective):
Returns.s4_desc: If a factory defect is found, the product is repaired free of charge under warranty or replaced with a new one.
Returns.s5_desc: After the product is returned, the payment amount will be refunded within 3 working days.

Stores.title: Our Stores
Stores.subtitle: Find the branch nearest to you
Stores.intro_desc: Our central store is located in Termez city. In the near future, we plan to open branches in all districts of the region.
Stores.empty_desc: Currently, there are no active stores in the system.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.subtitle: The confidentiality of your personal data is the highest value for the HADAF Marketplace.
Privacy.s1_p1: This Privacy Policy (hereinafter â€” "Policy") defines the procedure for collecting, storing, processing and protecting user personal data by the HADAF Marketplace (hereinafter â€” "Platform").
Privacy.s1_p2: This document was developed based on the Law of the Republic of Uzbekistan "On personal data" (No. ZRU-547), the laws "On electronic commerce" and "On informatization", and fully complies with international data protection standards.
Privacy.s2_p1: The Platform may collect the following categories of information in the process of serving users:
Privacy.s2_c1_desc: Full name, phone number, delivery address, email, and login credentials.
Privacy.s2_c2_desc: IP address, browser type and version, time zone, operating system, device model and ID.
Privacy.s2_c3_desc: Purchase history, order statuses, discounts and payment methods (bank card data is not stored by us).
Privacy.s2_c4_desc: Products you have viewed, search queries, and the wishlist on the Platform.
Privacy.s3_p1: We use the collected information solely for the following strictly defined purposes:
Privacy.s3_i1: Execution of transactions: Processing orders, accepting payments and delivering products by couriers to your address.
Privacy.s3_i2: Security: Preventing fraud, protecting accounts from unauthorized access and ensuring system stability.
Privacy.s3_i3: Improving the quality of service: Adapting the Platform interface to user interests and eliminating technical errors.
Privacy.s3_i4: Communication: Sending notifications about order status and answers to your questions.
Privacy.s4_p1: The HADAF Platform uses a multi-level security system to protect data. Our control servers are located in the territory of the Republic of Uzbekistan and fully comply with the sovereignty requirements of the legislation of the Republic of Uzbekistan.
Privacy.s4_c1_desc: All personal data is encoded using the world's strongest encryption keys.
Privacy.s4_c2_desc: Communication between the browser and server is carried out through encrypted TLS channels.
Privacy.s5_p1: Without your consent, we never sell your personal data to advertising agencies or other commercial organizations. Data is transferred only in the following limited circle:
Privacy.s5_i1: Logistics partners: Your name and address are passed to the courier service delivering the order.
Privacy.s5_i2: Payment authorities: For safe transactions, data required by payment gateways is transferred.
Privacy.s5_i3: State authorities: In cases provided by the legislation of the Republic of Uzbekistan, at the request of official judicial or law enforcement agencies.
Privacy.s6_p1: The buyer has the following rights regarding their personal data:
Privacy.s6_r1: Right to view and receive a copy of data
Privacy.s6_r3: Right to delete data from the Platform database (Right to be forgotten)
Privacy.s6_r4: Restriction of processing or opting out of marketing messages
Privacy.cta_title: Do you have questions or inquiries?
Privacy.cta_desc: If you have additional questions regarding the deletion or protection of your personal data, write to our specialist.

Terms.title: Public Offer
Terms.subtitle: Legal terms and conditions for using the HADAF marketplace. All transactions are regulated by this document.
Terms.s1_1_d: This Public Offer (hereinafter â€” "Agreement") is an official proposal in accordance with Article 367 of the Civil Code of the Republic of Uzbekistan. The Agreement defines the terms of remote sale and purchase between the "HADAF" trademark (hereinafter â€” "Seller"), located in Termez city, Surkhandarya region, and physical or legal entities (hereinafter â€” "Buyer") using the Marketplace services.
Terms.s1_2_d: The Agreement is drawn up based on the laws of the Republic of Uzbekistan "On electronic commerce", "On protection of consumer rights", "On informatization" and the resolution of the Cabinet of Ministers of the Republic of Uzbekistan "On approval of retail trade rules in the Republic of Uzbekistan".
Terms.s1_3_d: Registration of the Buyer on the Marketplace, entry of personal data, placing an order or making a payment â€” is a full and unconditional acceptance (Acceptance) of the terms of this Agreement. After making the Acceptance, the Agreement is equivalent to a contract concluded in writing.
Terms.s1_4_d: This Agreement applies to all goods and services presented on the HADAF.uz website and in its mobile applications. The Buyer is obliged to familiarize themselves with the version of the Agreement before making a purchase. The Seller may change the conditions at any time unilaterally.
Terms.s2_d1_d: An information system functioning through the HADAF.uz domain and mobile applications, containing a catalog of Goods and organizing electronic transactions between the Seller and the Buyer.
Terms.s2_d2_d: A capable individual or legal entity ordering Goods through the Marketplace for personal, family or other purposes not related to business activities.
Terms.s2_d3_d: Any material thing or complex of goods presented by the Seller for sale on the Marketplace, indicating description, photo and price.
Terms.s2_d4_d: A professional courier or transport organization receiving the Product from the Seller's warehouse and delivering it to the Buyer at the specified address.
Terms.s2_d5_d: The Buyer's personal page on the Marketplace designed to manage identification data, order history and payment statuses.
Terms.s3_1_d: All intellectual property objects placed on the Marketplace, including texts, graphic images, illustrations, video clips, logos, trademarks, and software, are the exclusive property of "HADAF".
Terms.s3_2_d: It is strictly forbidden to copy, publish, modify or place on other internet resources any information from the Marketplace without the official written consent of the Seller.
Terms.s3_3_d: Accessing the Marketplace system using automated tools (bots, scrapers, parsers) and data collection is considered a violation of system security.
Terms.s3_alert: In case of violation of rights, the Seller reserves the right to judicially recover the damages incurred based on the Civil and Administrative liability codes of the Republic of Uzbekistan.
Terms.s4_1_d: Product prices on the Marketplace are set in the national currency (sum). The indicated prices include VAT and other mandatory payments.
Terms.s4_2_d: The Buyer can pay for the order through online payment systems integrated into the Marketplace (Uzcard, Humo, Payme, Click) or upon receipt of the product (cash or terminal).
Terms.s4_3_d: When making online payments, card data is transmitted through encrypted TLS 1.2 channels. HADAF does not store bank card data on its servers.
Terms.s4_4_d: When an order is canceled or a product is returned, funds are returned to the Buyer's bank card within 3 to 10 working days.
Terms.s5_1_d: The HADAF center is located in Termez city, Surkhandarya region. Within Termez city, products are delivered within 2-6 hours.
Terms.s5_2_d: Delivery to Tashkent city and regional centers is guaranteed within 24-48 hours, to remote areas â€” within 72-120 hours.
Terms.s5_3_d: Upon acceptance of the product, the Buyer must check in the presence of the courier: product name, quantity, and appearance.
Terms.s5_4_d: After arriving at the address, the courier must wait for the Buyer for 15 minutes.
Terms.s5_note_desc: After signing the documents for the transfer and acceptance of the product, claims regarding mechanical damage or integrity are not accepted.
Terms.s6_list_desc: According to the resolution of the Cabinet of Ministers of the Republic of Uzbekistan No. 75, the following products of proper quality are not subject to return:
Terms.s6_1_d: The Buyer can return the product within 10 calendar days (if not used and packaging is intact).
Terms.s6_2_d: Based on a specialist's conclusion, it is repaired free of charge or replaced with a similar quality product.
Terms.s6_3_d: The costs of returning defective products are borne by the Seller.
Terms.s7_1_d: Personal data is processed based on the Law of the Republic of Uzbekistan "On Personal Data".
Terms.s7_2_d: Full name, phone number, address, cookies, and transaction history are collected.
Terms.s7_3_d: The data serves for order delivery, customer communication, and improving service quality.
Terms.s7_4_d: Data is protected from third parties using AES-256 bit encryption and TLS 1.2 protocols.
Terms.s7_5_d: Data is provided only to courier and payment systems for service provision.
Terms.s7_6_d: The Buyer has the right to demand the deletion of their personal data from the Platform database at any time.
Terms.s7_desc: All personal data and inter-server communications are protected by an international bank-level AES-256 encryption protocol.
Terms.s8_1_d: Responsible for the accuracy of description and compliance with terms. Except for Force Majeure situations.
Terms.s8_2_d: In case of delay or impossibility of delivery due to an incorrect address, all material damages are borne by the Buyer.
Terms.s8_3_d: The Seller is not responsible for temporary technical interruptions of the Platform.
Terms.s8_quote: The Seller does not pay material compensation for indirect damages, i.e. lost profits or moral damage.
Terms.s9_1_d: Disputes are primarily resolved in a mandatory manner through a written claim (15 working days).
Terms.s9_2_d: In the absence of an agreement, the dispute is considered in the competent court of Termez city.
Terms.s9_3_d: The Seller reserves the right not to recognize decisions of foreign courts if they contradict the legislation of the Republic of Uzbekistan.
